 A composition law for substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 22-Mar-2018.)
statement: sbco3 $p |- ( [ z / y ] [ y / x ] ph <-> [ z / x ] [ x / y ] ph ) $.
